mapper.insert: insert into label (board_id, label_name, red, green, blue) select (), #{labelName}, #{red}, #{green}, #{blue}
insert into task_label (board_id, task_id, label_id) select (), #{taskId}, #{labelId}
mapper.delete: delete l from board b inner join label l on b.board_id = l.board_id and b.board_name = #{boardName} and l.label_id = #{labelId}
